queryList.query: SELECT MST.AREA1 ID ,CONCAT(MST.AREA1,'(',COUNT(*),')') NM FROM ( SELECT ATFUNC_Z_GETADDRESS1(ADDRESS) AREA1 FROM AT_ORGANIZATION_BSC ORG ) MST WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY MST.AREA1 ORDER BY MST.AREA1 ASC

SELECT AREA2 ID ,CONCAT(MST.AREA2,'(',COUNT(*),')') NM FROM ( SELECT ATFUNC_Z_GETADDRESS1(ADDRESS) AREA1 ,ATFUNC_Z_GETADDRESS2(ADDRESS) AREA2 FROM AT_ORGANIZATION_BSC ORG WHERE 1=1 ) MST WHERE 1=1 AND MST.AREA1 = #{orgArea1} GROUP BY MST.AREA1, MST.AREA2 ORDER BY MST.AREA1 ASC, MST.AREA2 ASC
